Player History
Hit for the cycle against Cleveland on 5/11/2001...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 6/14/2001...
Was selected to the 2001 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2002...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/2003, hitting .550 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 2003 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/10/2004 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2005 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 5/13/2006...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/2006, hitting .520 with 5 HR, 14 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/2006, hitting .556 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2006, hitting .404 with 9 HR, 39 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2006...
Was selected to the 2007 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against New York (A) on 9/7/2007...
Released by Kansas City on 11/1/2007...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/26/2008 to a 3-year deal worth $12,500,000 per year...
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2008...
Traded from New York (N) to Arizona on 2/28/2009 (Going to ARI: P J. Peavy, CF C. Beltran. Going to NYM: C K. Shoppach, P M. Moore, P D. Hernandez, 1B B. Belt)...
Was selected to the 2009 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against New York (N) on 8/27/2009...
Injured on 10/6/2009 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 3/1/2011 to a 4-year deal worth $9,000,001 per year...
Injured on 5/21/2011 with a Broken Hand, out for 9 weeks...
Had 2000th career hit on 4/6/2012, off Forest Propp (TB)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New York (A) on 4/11/2012...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Baltimore on 4/4/2013...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/31/2013 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Montreal on 10/3/2014...
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Toronto in 2018...
Had first career hit on 4/14/2020, off Kevin Ziomek (MIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/28/2020, off Nicanor Espinosa (MIL)...
Drafted in 2nd round, 34th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1977...
Traded from San Francisco to Philadelphia on 3/2/1977 (Going to SF: P B. Sprowl. Going to PHI: CF R. Roenicke)...
Injured on 7/31/1981 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
